verses.verse: Then <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>celebrated<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and they <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [animals] on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> [day] of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And he <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> in their <S%H4931>offices<s%> and <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> them in the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

He also <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H995>taught<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [and] who were <S%H6918>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5414>"Put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H727>ark<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1129>built;<s%> it will be a <S%H4853>burden<s%> on [your] <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> longer. <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And <S%H3559>prepare<s%> [yourselves] by your fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> in your <S%H4256>divisions,<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and according to the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

"Moreover, <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place according to the <S%H6391>sections<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>lay<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and according to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> by <S%H2515>division<s%> of a father's <S%H1004>household.<s%>

"Now <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [animals], <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> yourselves, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> for your <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>"

And <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H7311>contributed<s%> to the <S%H1121>lay<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> who were <S%H4672>present,<s%> <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H3532>lambs<s%> and <S%H1121>kids,<s%> <S%H5795><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> for the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H6453>offerings,<s%> <S%H4557>numbering<s%> 30000 plus 3000 <S%H1241>bulls;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were from the king's <S%H7399>possessions.<s%>

His <S%H8269>officers<s%> also <S%H7311>contributed<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> the <S%H5057>officials<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> for the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H6453>offerings<s%> 2600 [from the flocks] <S%H300>and<s%> <S%H1241>bulls.<s%>

<S%H3562>Conaniah<s%> also, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethanel,<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and <S%H3262>Jeiel<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> the <S%H8269>officers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H7311>contributed<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H6453>offerings<s%> 5000 [from the flocks] <S%H500>and<s%> <S%H1241>bulls.<s%>

So the <S%H5656>service<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at their <S%H5977>stations<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> by their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> according to the king's <S%H4687>command.<s%>

And they <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [animals], and while the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> [received] from their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6584>skinned<s%> [them].

Then they <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> that [they] might <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H4653>sections<s%> of the fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of the <S%H1121>lay<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7126>present<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> [They did] <S%H3651>this<s%> also with the <S%H1241>bulls.<s%>

So they <S%H1310>roasted<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [animals] on the <S%H784>fire<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> and they <S%H1310>boiled<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> in <S%H5518>pots,<s%> in <S%H1731>kettles,<s%> in <S%H6745>pans,<s%> and <S%H7323>carried<s%> [them] <S%H7323>speedily<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>lay<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterwards<s%> they <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for themselves and for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> [were] <S%H5927>offering<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3915>night;<s%> therefore the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for themselves and for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

The <S%H7891>singers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> [were] also at their <S%H4612>stations<s%> according to the <S%H4687>command<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> the king's <S%H2374>seer;<s%> and the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> at <S%H8179>each<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> did not <S%H369>have<s%> to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from their <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> according to the <S%H4687>command<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%>

Thus the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H6213>celebrated<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And there had not been <S%H6213>celebrated<s%> a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> had <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>celebrated<s%> such a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were <S%H4672>present,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
In the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of Josiah's <S%H4438>reign<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6453>Passover<s%> was <S%H6213>celebrated.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> had <S%H3559>set<s%> the <S%H1004>temple<s%> in <S%H3559>order,<s%> <S%H5224>Neco<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H3898>make<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> at <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%> on the <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> and <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>engage<s%> him.

But Neco <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have we to do with each other, O <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? [I am] not [coming] <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> but <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> with which I am at <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>ordered<s%> me to <S%H926>hurry.<s%> <S%H2308>Stop<s%> for your own sake from [interfering with] <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is with me, that He may not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you."

However, <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> would not <S%H5437>turn<s%> <S%H5437>away<s%> from him, but <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself in order to <S%H3898>make<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> with him; <S%H3808>nor<s%> did he <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5224>Neco<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> but <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3898>make<s%> <S%H3898>war<s%> on the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%>

And the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H5674>"Take<s%> me <S%H5674>away,<s%> for I am <S%H3966>badly<s%> <S%H2470>wounded.<s%>"

So his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H5674>took<s%> him out of the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> and <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had, and <S%H1980>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> where he <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> of his fathers. And <S%H1>all<s%> <S%H3605>Judah<s%> and <S%H3063>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3389>mourned<s%> for <S%H56>Josiah.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H6969>chanted<s%> a <S%H6969>lament<s%> for <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the male and female <S%H7891>singers<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> in their <S%H7015>lamentations<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%> And they <S%H5414>made<s%> them an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are also <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H7015>Lamentations.<s%>
Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> and his <S%H2617>deeds<s%> of <S%H2617>devotion<s%> as <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and his <S%H1697>acts,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> to <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
